main.description: I create custom solutions in JavaScript and Typescript, frequently leveraging technologies like React, Astro, and/or Next. I'm a wiz with Python, and enjoy tackling backend challenges pertaining to scalability, security, and functionality.

about.heading: About me
about.blurb: I'm a mom, partner, developer, voracious reader, and year-round grower of things.
about.professionalDesc: Professionally, I thrive on a diverse team of empathetic, creative, skilled devs, but also enjoy freelancing on my own, particularly when working with small local businesses.
about.personalDesc: Away from screens, I wrangle my toddler, play board games with my husband, care for our gardens and land, cook, and read.

time.stayTuned: Currently building something fun for this space!

contact.heading: Talk to me!
contact.freelance: I'm currently available for web development projects with small businesses.
contact.permanentFT: I'm also open to exploring a remote, full-time role with your team!

color.stayTuned: Something interactive coming to this space soon!
